meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with brightly colored flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alstroemeria in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of alstroemeria for my friend's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the alstroemeria bed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a field of alstroemeria.
meanings.sent5: The scent of alstroemeria filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The brightly colored flowers of the alstroemeria plant.
meanings.sent1: She admired the delicate alstroemeria in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The alstroemeria added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the alstroemeria petals.
meanings.sent4: His tie was as bright as a bunch of alstroemeria.
meanings.sent5: The alstroemeria petals danced in the breeze.
